job_history.work_description: Helps to develop policies, directs and coordinates activities such as employment, compensation, labor relations, benefits, training, and employee services. Prepares employee separation notices and related documentation. Keeps records of benefits plans participation such as insurance and pension plan, personnel transactions such as hires, promotions, transfers, performance reviews, and terminations, and employee statistics for government reporting. Advises management in appropriate resolution of employee relations issues. Administers benefits programs such as life, health, dental, insurance, pension plans, vacation, sick leave, leave of absence, and employee assistance.

Reviewed medical bills for the accuracy of the treatments, tests, and hospital stays prior to sanctioning the claims. Trained to interpret the codes (ICD-9, CPT) and terminology commonly used in medical billing to fully understand the paperwork that is submitted by healthcare providers. Required to have organizational and analytical skills as well as computer skills, knowledge of medical terminology and procedures, statistics, billing standards, data analysis and laws regarding medical billing.

Performed duties including but not limited to, budgeting and financial management, accounting, human resources, payroll and purchasing. Established and maintained close working relationships with all departments of the hotel to ensure maximum operation, productivity, morale and guest service. Handled daily operations and reported directly to the corporate office. Hired and trained staff on overall objectives and goals with an emphasis on high customer service. Marketing and Advertising, working on public relations with the media, government and local businesses and Chamber of Commerce.

Provided assistance to various department heads - Executive, Marketing, Customer Service, Human Resources. Managed front-end operations to ensure friendly and efficient transactions. Ensured the swift resolution of customer issues to preserve customer loyalty while complying with company policies. Exemplified the second-to-none customer service delivery in all interactions with customers and potential clients.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in HR administration, including developing policies, coordinating employee relations, and administering benefits programs, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Has experience advising management in resolving employee relations issues, showing strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Benefits Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience administering benefits programs, including life, health, dental insurance, pension plans, and employee assistance, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Medical Billing
skills.explanation: Has experience reviewing medical bills for accuracy, interpreting medical codes and terminology, and analyzing data, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience analyzing data for medical billing and employee statistics, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting and Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with budgeting and financial management, including accounting and payroll, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in leadership roles, including hiring and training staff, and managing daily operations, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience ensuring high customer service delivery in various roles, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Has some experience with marketing and advertising, including public relations and working with the media, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: No direct experience with project management mentioned in the job history or education.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has some experience with accounting, including payroll and financial management, showing some practical experience.
